CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The optical properties and electronic structure ( HOMO / LUMO levels and bandgap ) can be manipulated through adjusting copolymerized building blocks. '

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |
| bandgap |

Note: HOMO, LUMO, and bandgap are not proper nouns or specific materials, but rather technical terms used to describe properties of materials. They are not entities in the classical sense, but they are relevant to the context of the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to material names:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |

The term "bandgap" is not a material name, but rather a property of materials, so it has been removed from the list.
